tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE diversity_hiring_statistics (
    report_id INT,
    department_id INT,
    job_title VARCHAR(255),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
    hiring_date DATE,
    termination_date DATE,
    report_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE diversity_hiring_statistics (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    total_applicants INT,
    diversity_applicants INT
);

CREATE TABLE diversity_hiring_statistics (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    department_name VARCHAR(255),
    job_title VARCHAR(255),
    total_employees INT,
    minority_employees INT,
    gender_diversity_ratio FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE employee_demerographics (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(20),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
    education_level VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE diversity_initiatives (
    initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    impact_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE diversity_stats (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    total_applicants INT NOT NULL,
    diverse_applicants INT NOT NULL,
    hired_diverse_applicants INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE diversity_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    job_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    department VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    diversity_category VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    applicants_count INT,
    hires_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE employee_demographics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    gender VARCHAR(255),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    years_of_service INT,
    FOREIGN KEY(employee_id) REFERENCES diversity_metrics(id)
);

CREATE TABLE diversity_training (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    training_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    training_date DATE NOT NULL,
    employee_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY(employee_id) REFERENCES employee_demographics(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE diversity_survey (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_date DATE NOT NULL,
    employee_id INT,
    survey_question VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    survey_response VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY(employee_id) REFERENCES employee_demographics(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE diversity_reports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    report_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    report_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_by VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);
